6 void GoalPublisherMoveBase::sendGoal(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) {
7  auto goal = Converter::tfToMoveBaseGoal(pose);
8  while (not move_base_client_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(SERVER_WAIT_DURATION))) {
9  ROS_WARN("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
